name: Celtic Tales: Balor of the Evil Eye
name_original: Celtic Tales: Balor of the Evil Eye
description:
Celtic Tales: Balor of the Evil Eye is a RPG-strategy game developed by KOEI. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Koei. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Celtic Tales: Balor of the Evil Eye is available on PC.
